languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes a free single attack with the selected weapon. This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, does not end the Bounty Hunter's movement, but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}% of the Bounty Hunter's usual {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. After each third enemy killed by {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Claim the Bounty{/g}, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}. Prey: if {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Claim the Bounty{/g} kills a target marked as prey, the Bounty Hunter receives +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Охотник за головами{/g} совершает одиночную бесплатную атаку выбранным оружием. Эта {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}атака{/g} всегда попадает в цель, не завершает движение охотника, но наносит только {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}% от обычного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} охотника за головами. После устранения каждой третьей цели с помощью Награды за голову охотник за головами восстанавливает 1 заряд Законной добычи. Добыча: если при применении Награды за голову убита цель, отмеченная как "добыча", охотник за головами получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Hunter makes a free single attack with the selected weapon. That attack always hits, does not end the Hunter's movement, but deals just (4 × (BS bonus + PER bonus))% of usual damage. After each third enemy killed by Slay the Game, the Hunter recovers 1 charge of Hunt Down the Prey. Prey: If Slay the Game kills a prey, the Hunter recieves +2 AP.

The Hunter makes a free single attack with the selected weapon. That attack always hits, does not end the Hunter's movement, but deals just (4 × (BS bonus + PER bonus))% of usual damage. After each third enemy killed by Slay the Game, the Hunter recovers +1 charge of Hunt Down the Prey. Prey: if Slay the Game kills a target marked as prey, the Hunter receives +2 AP.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes a free single attack with the selected weapon. This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, does not end the Bounty Hunter's movement, but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}% of the Bounty Hunter's usual {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. After each third enemy killed by Claim the Bounty, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of Hunt Down the Prey. Prey: if Claim the Bounty kills a target marked as prey, the Bounty Hunter receives +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

The Hunter makes a free single attack with the selected weapon. That attack always {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g}, does not end the Hunter's movement, but deals just {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}% of usual damage. After each third enemy killed by Slay the Game, the Hunter recovers +1 charge of Hunt Down the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Prey{/g}. Prey: if Slay the Game kills a target marked as prey, the Hunter receives +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes a free single attack with the selected weapon. This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, does not end the Bounty Hunter's movement, but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}% of the Bounty Hunter's usual {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. After each third enemy killed by Claim the Bounty, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of Hunt Down the Prey. Prey: if Claim the Bounty kills a target marked as prey, the Bounty Hunter receives +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}使用选择的武器进行一次没有消耗的单体攻击。此次攻击必定{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标，且不会打断赏金猎人的移动，但本次攻击造成的伤害仅为通常{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}的{uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}%。 每当赏金猎人使用{g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}索取赏金{/g}杀死三名敌人后，{g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}击杀猎物{/g}的使用次数就会恢复1次。 猎物：如果{g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}索取赏金{/g}杀死了被标记为猎物的目标，赏金猎人将会获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes a free single attack with the selected weapon. This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, does not end the Bounty Hunter's movement, but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}% of the Bounty Hunter's usual {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. After each third enemy killed by {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Claim the Bounty{/g}, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}. Prey: if {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Claim the Bounty{/g} kills a target marked as prey, the Bounty Hunter receives +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}使用选择的武器进行一次没有消耗的单体攻击。此次攻击必定{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标，且不会打断赏金猎人的移动，但本次攻击造成的伤害仅为通常{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}的{uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}%。 每当赏金猎人使用索取赏金杀死三名敌人后，击杀猎物的使用次数就会恢复1次。 猎物：如果索取赏金杀死了被标记为猎物的目标，赏金猎人将会获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

猎人使用选择的武器进行一次没有消耗的单体攻击。此次攻击必定{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标，且不会打断猎人的移动，但本次攻击造成的伤害仅为通常伤害的{uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}。 每当屠戮猎物杀死三名敌人之后，猎人的击杀{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}的使用次数就会恢复1次。 猎物：如果屠戮猎物杀死了被标记为猎物的目标，猎人将会获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} lanza un único ataque gratis con el arma elegida. El ataque siempre {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} y no finaliza el movimiento del cazarrecompensas, pero solo inflige un {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9} % del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} habitual del cazarrecompensas. Cada 3 enemigos muertos por {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Cobrar la recompensa{/g}, el cazarrecompensas recupera 1 carga de {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Cazar a la presa{/g}. Presa: Si Cobrar la recompensa mata a un enemigo marcado como presa, el cazarrecompensas recibe +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes a free single attack with the selected weapon. This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, does not end the Bounty Hunter's movement, but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}% of the Bounty Hunter's usual {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. After each third enemy killed by {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Claim the Bounty{/g}, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}. Prey: if {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Claim the Bounty{/g} kills a target marked as prey, the Bounty Hunter receives +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} lanza un solo ataque gratis con el arma elegida. El ataque siempre {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} y no finaliza el movimiento del cazarrecompensas, pero solo inflige un {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9} % del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} habitual. Cada 3 enemigos muertos por Matar a la presa, el cazarrecompensas recupera 1 carga de Cazar a la {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g}. Presa: Si Matar a la presa mata a un enemigo marcado como presa, el cazarrecompensas recupera 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

El cazador lanza un solo ataque gratis con el arma elegida. El ataque siempre {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g} y no finaliza el movimiento del cazador, pero solo inflige un {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9} % del daño habitual. Cada 3 enemigos muertos por Matar a la presa, el cazador recupera 1 carga de Cazar a la {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g}. Presa: Si Matar a la presa mata a un enemigo marcado como presa, el cazador recupera 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}が選択した武器でランダムに1回攻撃する。この攻撃は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}し、バウンティハンターの移動を終了させないが、通常の{uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}% %の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}のみ与える。 報酬ゲットで3体目の敵を倒すごとに、バウンティハンターの獲物狩りのチャージが+1回復する。 獲物：報酬ゲットで獲物としてマークされたターゲットを倒すと、バウンティハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が+2増加する。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes a free single attack with the selected weapon. This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, does not end the Bounty Hunter's movement, but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}% of the Bounty Hunter's usual {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. After each third enemy killed by Claim the Bounty, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of Hunt Down the Prey. Prey: if Claim the Bounty kills a target marked as prey, the Bounty Hunter receives +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}が選択した武器でランダムに1回攻撃する。この攻撃は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}し、バウンティハンターの移動を終了させないが、通常の{uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}% %の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}のみ与える。 報酬ゲットで3体目の敵を倒すごとに、バウンティハンターの獲物狩りのチャージが+1回復する。 獲物：報酬ゲットで獲物としてマークされたターゲットを倒すと、バウンティハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が+2増加する。

ハンターが選択した武器でランダムに1回攻撃する。この攻撃は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}し、ハンターの移動を終了させないが、通常の{uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}%のダメージのみ与える。 遊びの終わりで3体目の敵を倒すごとに、ハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}狩りのチャージが+1回復する。 獲物：遊びの終わりが獲物としてマークされたターゲットを倒すと、ハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が+2増加する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Охотник за головами{/g} совершает одиночную бесплатную атаку выбранным оружием. Эта {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}атака{/g} всегда попадает в цель, не завершает движение охотника, но наносит только {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}% от обычного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} охотника за головами. После устранения каждой третьей цели с помощью {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Награды за голову{/g} охотник за головами восстанавливает 1 заряд {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Законной добычи{/g}. Добыча: если при применении {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Награды за голову{/g} убита цель, отмеченная как "добыча", охотник за головами получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes a free single attack with the selected weapon. This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, does not end the Bounty Hunter's movement, but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}% of the Bounty Hunter's usual {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. After each third enemy killed by {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Claim the Bounty{/g}, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}. Prey: if {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Claim the Bounty{/g} kills a target marked as prey, the Bounty Hunter receives +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Охотник за головами{/g} совершает одиночную бесплатную атаку выбранным оружием. Эта {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}атака{/g} всегда попадает в цель, не завершает движение охотника, но наносит только {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}% от обычного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} охотника за головами. После устранения каждой третьей цели с помощью {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Награды за голову{/g} охотник за головами восстанавливает 1 заряд {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Законной добычи{/g}. Добыча: если при применении {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Награды за голову{/g} убита цель, отмеченная как "добыча", охотник за головами получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

Охотник совершает одиночную бесплатную атаку выбранным оружием. Эта атака всегда {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадает{/g} в цель, не завершает движение охотника, но наносит только (4 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}ДБ{/g} + бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g}))% от обычного урона. После устранения каждой третьей цели с помощью Охотничьих забав охотник восстанавливает 1 заряд Законной добычи. Добыча: если при применении Охотничьих забав убита цель, отмеченная как "добыча", охотник получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

Охотник совершает одиночную бесплатную атаку выбранным оружием. Эта атака всегда {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадает{/g} в цель, не завершает движение охотника, но наносит только {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}% от обычного урона. После устранения каждой третьей цели с помощью Охотничьих забав охотник восстанавливает 1 заряд Законной добычи. Добыча: если при применении Охотничьих забав убита цель, отмеченная как "добыча", охотник получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} führt einen kostenlosen Einzelangriff mit der ausgewählten Waffe aus. Dieser Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} immer, beendet die Bewegung des Kopfgeldjägers nicht, aber fügt dafür {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9} % des normalen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g} zu. Nach jedem dritten Feind, der von {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Das Kopfgeld einfordern{/g} getötet wurde, erlangt der Kopfgeldjäger +1 Ladung von {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Jagd auf die Beute machen{/g} zurück. Beute: Wenn {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Das Kopfgeld einfordern{/g} ein als Beute markiertes Ziel tötet, erhält der Kopfgeldjäger +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes a free single attack with the selected weapon. This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, does not end the Bounty Hunter's movement, but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}% of the Bounty Hunter's usual {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. After each third enemy killed by {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Claim the Bounty{/g}, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}. Prey: if {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Claim the Bounty{/g} kills a target marked as prey, the Bounty Hunter receives +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} führt einen kostenlosen Einzelangriff mit der ausgewählten Waffe aus. Dieser Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} immer, beendet die Bewegung des Kopfgeldjägers nicht, aber fügt dafür nur {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9} % des normalen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g} zu. Nach jedem dritten Feind, der von Erlegen des Wildes getötet wurde, erlangt der Kopfgeldjäger +1 Ladung von Jagd auf die {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} machen zurück. Beute: Wenn Erlegen des Wildes ein als Beute markiertes Ziel tötet, erhält der Kopfgeldjäger +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

Der Jäger führt einen kostenlosen Einzelangriff mit der auswählten Waffen aus. Dieser Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g} immer, beendet die Bewegung des Jägers nicht, aber fügt dafür nur {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9} % des normalen Schadens zu. Nach jedem dritten Feind, der von Erlegen des Wildes getötet wurde, erlangt der Jäger +1 Ladung von Jagd auf die {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} machen zurück. Beute: Wenn Erlegen des Wildes ein als Beute markiertes Ziel tötet, erhält der Jäger +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}chasseur de primes{/g} lance une attaque ponctuelle gratuite avec l'arme sélectionnée. Cette attaque {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} toujours sa cible, ne met pas fin au déplacement du chasseur de primes, mais n'inflige que {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9} % des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} habituels. Au troisième ennemi éliminé par {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Obtention de la prime{/g}, le chasseur de primes récupère +1 charge de {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Traque de la proie{/g}. Proie : si {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Obtention de la prime{/g} élimine une cible désignée en tant que proie, le chasseur de primes reçoit +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes a free single attack with the selected weapon. This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, does not end the Bounty Hunter's movement, but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}% of the Bounty Hunter's usual {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. After each third enemy killed by {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Claim the Bounty{/g}, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}. Prey: if {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Claim the Bounty{/g} kills a target marked as prey, the Bounty Hunter receives +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le Chasseur lance une attaque ponctuelle gratuite avec l'arme sélectionnée. Cette attaque {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} toujours la cible, ne met pas fin au déplacement du Chasseur, mais n'inflige que (4 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}CB{/g} + bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g})) % des dégâts habituels. Au troisième ennemi éliminé par Tuer le Gibier, le Chasseur récupère +1 charge de Traque de la {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Proie{/g}. Proie : si Tuer le Gibier élimine une cible désignée comme une proie, le Chasseur reçoit +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

Le Chasseur lance une attaque ponctuelle gratuite avec l'arme sélectionnée. Cette attaque {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} toujours la cible, ne met pas fin au déplacement du Chasseur, mais n'inflige que {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9} % des dégâts habituels. Au troisième ennemi éliminé par Tuer le Gibier, le Chasseur récupère +1 charge de Traque de la {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Proie{/g}. Proie : si Tuer le Gibier élimine une cible désignée comme une proie, le Chasseur reçoit +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Ödül Avcısı{/g}, seçtiği silahla tek bir serbest saldırı gerçekleştirir. Bu saldırı her daim {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurur{/g} ve Ödül Avcısı'nın hareketini sonlandırmaz ancak Ödül Avcısı'nın normalde verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarın{/g} yalnızca %{uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9} kadarını verir. Ödül Avcısı, {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Başa Konulan Ödül{/g} ile öldürülen her üç düşmanda {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Av Peşinde{/g} kabiliyetinin 1 kullanım hakkını geri kazanır. Av: {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Başa Konulan Ödül{/g} kabiliyeti, av olarak işaretlenmiş bir hedefi öldürürse Ödül Avcısı +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} kazanır.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes a free single attack with the selected weapon. This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, does not end the Bounty Hunter's movement, but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}% of the Bounty Hunter's usual {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. After each third enemy killed by {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Claim the Bounty{/g}, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}. Prey: if {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Claim the Bounty{/g} kills a target marked as prey, the Bounty Hunter receives +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Ödül Avcısı{/g}, seçtiği silahla tek bir serbest saldırı gerçekleştirir. Bu saldırı her daim {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurur{/g} ve Ödül Avcısı'nın hareketini sonlandırmaz ancak Ödül Avcısı'nın normalde verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarın{/g} yalnızca %{uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9} kadarını verir. Ödül Avcısı, öldürdüğü her üç düşmanda {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Başa Konulan Ödül{/g}'ün 1 kullanım hakkını geri kazanır. Av: {g|f:8930d6ba62ca4bc3a30a9900e741d87c}Başa Konulan Ödül{/g} kabiliyeti, av olarak işaretlenmiş bir hedefi öldürürse Ödül Avcısı +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} kazanır.

languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} makes a free single attack with the selected weapon. This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, does not end the Bounty Hunter's movement, but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|a78f3ecf5c024fac860fc2beaa63a8f9}% of the Bounty Hunter's usual {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. After each third enemy killed by Claim the Bounty, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}. Prey: if Claim the Bounty kills a target marked as prey, the Bounty Hunter receives +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
